# CT Basic

## Density

![Hounsfield scale ([ref](https://doi.org/10.53347/rID-77397))](../../img/basic/hounsfield-scale-diagram.jpg){#fig-hounsfield-scale-diagram width="60%"}

::: {.callout-tip appearance="simple"}


**Air** (`- 1000`) < **Fat** (`-100`) < **Water** (`0`) < **Soft tissue** (`+50`) < **Bone & Metal** (`1000`)
:::


-   Normally, Liver dense > spleen, if not suspect fatty liver.


![Fat stranding](../../img/basic/fat-stranding-and-differentials-diagram.jpg){#fig-fat-stranding width="60%"}


**Fat stranding:** increase density (dirty) around fat dueto increase fluid / soft tissue from inflammation [@fig-fat-stranding]
